text: 11.9: 2 Ko 12.13; Fi 4.15-18; 1 Te 2.9Gu nde phorga ki tugen, gu maaŋ muuŋgiap bigɨn the sosuagiap, gu ne nzuav simtɨgar nde the nɨɨŋgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, gu Masedonia thav, zav, Korinan zɨgi, mbe gu sosuagi bigi, mbe ntan nan kurigi. Gu khaŋ tɨga havhargiap kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, gu simtɨga thanen nden nɨɨngeŋ thagi. Gu ntigem mba ndɨkndɨgara zɨn vui.
